titleStmt.title: A Delineation and description of the famous city, Offen, otherwise called Buda together with a particular account of this late famous siege as an historical relation of the several sieges and other accidents that has hapned to it ever since it came into the Turkish posession / translated from the original in High-Dutch by Joseph Moxon.
titleStmt.author: Moxon, Joseph, 1627-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
